name: DriftWood (MrVice)
description:
The Idea was to have a puzzle map in which you have to find hidden buildings by building and connecting outposts and buildings, to increase your vision. As well as destroying those links at the cost of resources. To finally connect people, who enrich you with their musical performance.

Sadly starting merging two massive systems in the last few hours has led to mega conflicts, which lead to some unity bugs, and finally a setback to some hours before that. Therefore the joining of buildings does not work. Just imagine cute little bridges :winkyface:

Still had fun. Enjoy to play around a bit. (nothing to find in the mist due to time constraints, btw.)

WASD mouse => Cam

E/Q => rotate
